rows.name: Let's get a souvenir for Mom!
If you're tired, feel free to rest.

I might pay a visit to
Quattor Street later.
I've got a right to live in Acedia, don't I?
Welcome to Acedia!

This one or that one? Or this one...
Or that?

First things first.
I'll go to the Sanctum to give thanks.
The Sanctum's not too far now.
Hey there!
I'll try to remember that.
The choral music is truly sublime here.

I'll join the choir too,
when I'm old enough!
You can really get lost in these songs...

Hello. Me would like friend to
teach how me pray, please?

Listen children! Understanding this
system of notation is required for
employment in Acedia. Apply yourselves!
Let me check about tomorrow.

Nights are so quiet in Acedia.
It's really quite pleasant.

I think Grampaw went to drink
some Odifa again.

On consideration, I have to say
I'm opposed to Blades as such.
How long will this go on...?

I wonder how my friends 
in Gula are doing...
Every day the same old thing...

Ah...
It never gets any easier, does it?
And that big cathedral, meh...

I'm keeping a close eye on
the refugees from here.
Friend must be tired.

Night is the time when
I get my prep work done.
Anyone know what today's rations are?
No more Blades!
Down with Blades!

Ugh, I'm so hungry!
Isn't there any more to eat?!
Stop acting up,okay?
Yes. Sorry...
Whoop-whoop!
What're we gonna play today?
Why's the Divine Beast boat not here yet?

Taking in refugees sure is a handful...
I mean, it's a great thing and all, but...

Me will study hard
to master technology of Acedia!

Any chance the rations could be
increased?
I never thought we'd end up in Acedia...

It might taste better if you let
the spice come out more.

Mmm!
Nice and mellow!

No food or drink is allowed in the
Sanctum. Be sure to finish it out here.
Wish I could decide what to get...

That refugee was here
again today...
When can we go back to Gula?
Line up properly, you louts!
What I wouldn't give for a cold beer...
I gotta stay vigilant! Stay vigilant...
All right, form an orderly line!

When I'm all grown up,
I'll be the best soldier ever!
